00007 // IsTimeOrdered()
00008 // -- Returns tru of the first pulse is before the second
00009 // Static so that only this file sees it
00010 // Useful for sorting the pulses
00011 static bool IsTimeOrdered(TAnalysedPulse* a, TAnalysedPulse* b) {
00012   // Want a to be before b
00013   return ( a->GetTime() < b->GetTime() );
00014 }
00015 
00016 int MaxBinAPGenerator::ProcessPulses(
00017       const PulseIslandList& pulseList, AnalysedPulseList& analysedList){
00018 
00019       SetBankInfo(pulseList[0]->GetBankName());
00020 
00021       double amplitude, time, integral, energy;
00022 
00023       for (PulseIslandList::const_iterator pulseIter = pulseList.begin(); pulseIter != pulseList.end(); pulseIter++) {
00024          amplitude = 0;
00025          time = 0;
00026          integral = 0;
00027          energy = 0.;
00028          // Assume one TAnalysedPulse per TPulseIsland
00029          GetAllParameters_MaxBin(*pulseIter,amplitude,time,integral,energy);
00030 
00031          // Add the pulse into the list
00032          analysedList.push_back(new  TAnalysedPulse(amplitude, time, integral, energy, fDetName));
00033 
00034       }
00035       std::sort(analysedList.begin(), analysedList.end(), IsTimeOrdered);
00036       return 0;
00037 }
00038 
00039 void MaxBinAPGenerator::GetAllParameters_MaxBin(const TPulseIsland* pulse,
00040                                                  double& amplitude, double& time, double& integral, double& energy) {
00041 
00042 
00043   // First find the position of the peak
00044   std::vector<int> pulseSamples = pulse->GetSamples();
00045   int peak_sample_value = 0;
00046   int peak_sample_pos = 0;
00047   int this_height =0;
00048   for (std::vector<int>::const_iterator sampleIter = pulseSamples.begin(); sampleIter != pulseSamples.end(); sampleIter++) {
00049     
00050     this_height = fTriggerPolarity*(*(sampleIter) - fPedestal);
00051     if ( this_height > peak_sample_value ) {
00052       peak_sample_value = this_height;
00053       peak_sample_pos = sampleIter - pulseSamples.begin();
00054     }
00055   }
00056 
00057   // Now assign the parameters
00058   amplitude = peak_sample_value;
00059   time = ((pulse->GetTimeStamp() + peak_sample_pos) * fClockTick) - fTimeShift;
00060   integral = 0;
00061   energy = fECalibSlope * amplitude + fECalibOffset;
00062 }

00064 ALCAP_TAP_GENERATOR(MaxBin);
